name: A HERO AND A GARDEN - Game + Soundtrack
name_original: A HERO AND A GARDEN - Game + Soundtrack
description:
The A HERO AND A GARDEN - Game + Soundtrack bundle includes the game A HERO AND A GARDEN along with its soundtrack.

In this gardening visual novel and clicker game, play as a fairytale hero and help him garden, since saving the princess didn't go that well.
